title: RhinoCommon and Grasshopper templates: Visual Studio 2022
question:
Hello

Can you please update 
RhinoCommon and Grasshopper templates
.




marketplace.visualstudio.com








RhinoCommon and Grasshopper templates for Rhino 7 - Visual Studio Marketplace


Extension for Visual Studio - Adds plug-in, command and zoo wizards for RhinoCommon and Grasshopper projects. This includes digitizer, render, import and export plug-ins. Makes setting up debugging easier and automatically references RhinoCommon.dll....













To work with 
Visual Studio Community 2022

code_blocks.code:
<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk">
	<PropertyGroup>
		<TargetFramework>net4.8</TargetFramework>
		<TargetExt>.rhp</TargetExt>
		<EnableDefaultItems>False</EnableDefaultItems>
		<GenerateAssemblyInfo>False</GenerateAssemblyInfo>
	</PropertyGroup>
	<ItemGroup>
		<PackageReference Include="RhinoCommon" Version="7.12.21313.6341"/>
	</ItemGroup>
  <ItemGroup>
    <Compile Include="jesterLiveCodePlugin.cs" />
    <Compile Include="jesterBoxCommand.cs" />
    <Compile Include="jesterBoxConduit.cs" />
    <Compile Include="Properties/AssemblyInfo.cs" />
  </ItemGroup>
</Project>
code_blocks.author: nathanletwory
